summary: Gil-galad is a character in J.R.R. Tolkien's fantasy world, Middle-earth. He was the last king of the Noldor Elves. In the story, he fought against the evil Sauron alongside Elendil. Both heroes died in the battle. Gil-galad is remembered in poems and appears in *The Lord of the Rings* and *The Silmarillion*. He has also been featured in movies, video games, and TV shows based on Tolkien's work.
title: Gil-galad
